content: When you return to The Great Pagoda, a cutscene will  as you head toward the top of the room. You'll also unlock the secret area, which is Mount Mei. Waiting for you here, is Erlang, the Sacred Divinity.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 6', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, the Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
When you return to The Great Pagoda, a cutscene will  as you head toward the top of the room. You'll also unlock the secret area, which is Mount Mei. Waiting for you here, is Erlang, the Sacred Divinity.
